item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Monday, May 26, 2025 at 11:15 AM UTC
item.description:

8. Ask HN: What are you working on? (May 2025) (233 points | 710 comments)
9. Venta AI (YC S23) Is Hiring a Founding Full Stack Engineer in Amsterdam ( | hide)
10. Lottie is an open format for animated vector graphics (312 points | 143 comments)
11. At Amazon, some coders say their jobs have begun to resemble warehouse work (404 points | 572 comments)
12. GitHub issues is almost the best notebook in the world (46 points | 13 comments)

23. Design Pressure: The Invisible Hand That Shapes Your Code (184 points | 50 comments)
24. New method for creating large 3D models of urban areas is faster and cheaper (36 points | 3 comments)
25. 'Strange metals' point to a whole new way to understand electricity (10 points | 1 comment)
26. Tariffs in American History (137 points | 185 comments)
27. Writing a Self-Mutating x86_64 C Program (2013) (106 points | 30 comments)

29. Show HN: Zli – A Batteries-Included CLI Framework for Zig (83 points | 36 comments)
30. Chomsky on what ChatGPT is good for (2023) (224 points | 271 comments)
